lead_paragraph: PLAYER Angelica Figueroa, a 17-year-old senior at Linden High School in California, is hoping to land a spot on Mexico’s women’s national team when it plays qualifying matches for the Beijing Olympics at a regional tournament April 2-13 in Juarez, Mexico. Two of the six teams in the tournament will advance to the Summer Games in August. Figueroa was born in the United States, but her parents are from Mexico. She is expected to be with the Mexican team Friday when it plays Southern California, the N.C.A.A. champion, in Los Angeles.
